lead_paragraph: The Senate of the Democratic Republic of Congo voted Friday to eliminate a measure in an electoral law that critics say would have prolonged the president’s time in power.
snippet: The Senate of the Democratic Republic of Congo voted Friday to eliminate a measure in an electoral law that critics say would have prolonged the president’s time in power.

headline.main: Congo: Senate Amends Proposed Law After Protests
headline.print_headline: Congo: Senate Amends Proposed Law After Protests
